verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> Now it came to pass in the days שְׁפֹ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> when the judges הַשֹּׁפְטִ֔ים <S%H8199><s%> ruled וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came רָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> that there was a famine בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And a certain man מִבֵּ֧ית לֶ֣חֶם <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah לָגוּר֙ <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn בִּשְׂדֵ֣י <S%H7704><s%> in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> he and his wife וּשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> and his two בָנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> sons

וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> And the name הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the man אֱ‍ֽלִימֶ֡לֶךְ <S%H458><s%> [was] Elimelech וְשֵׁם֩ <S%H8034><s%> and the name אִשְׁתּ֨וֹ <S%H802><s%> of his wife נָעֳמִ֜י <S%H5281><s%> Naomi וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> of his two בָנָ֣יו ׀ <S%H1121><s%> sons מַחְל֤וֹן <S%H4248><s%> Mahlon וְכִלְיוֹן֙ <S%H3630><s%> and Chilion אֶפְרָתִ֔ים <S%H673><s%> Ephrathites מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came שְׂדֵי־ <S%H7704><s%> into the country מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> and remained שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> died אֱלִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H458><s%> And Elimelech אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> husband נָעֳמִ֑י <S%H5281><s%> Naomi's וַתִּשָּׁאֵ֥ר <S%H7604><s%> and she was left הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he וּשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> and her two בָנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1121><s%> sons

וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> And they took לָהֶ֗ם נָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> them wives מֹֽאֲבִיּ֔וֹת <S%H4125><s%> of Moab שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> of the one עָרְפָּ֔ה <S%H6204><s%> [was] Orpah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> of the other ר֑וּת <S%H7327><s%> Ruth וַיֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> and they dwelled שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there כְּעֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> there about ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיָּמ֥וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> died גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> also both מַחְל֣וֹן <S%H4248><s%> And Mahlon וְכִלְי֑וֹן <S%H3630><s%> and Chilion וַתִּשָּׁאֵר֙ <S%H7604><s%> was left הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> of them and the woman מִשְּׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> of her two יְלָדֶ֖יהָ <S%H3206><s%> sons וּמֵאִישָֽׁהּ׃ <S%H376><s%> and her husband

וַתָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> Then she arose הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וְכַלֹּתֶ֔יהָ <S%H3618><s%> with her daughters in law וַתָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> that she might return מִשְּׂדֵ֣י <S%H7704><s%> from the country מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שָֽׁמְעָה֙ <S%H8085><s%> for she had heard בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פָקַ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> had visited יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> in giving לָהֶ֖ם לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> them bread

וַתֵּצֵ֗א <S%H3318><s%> Wherefore she went forth מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> out of the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after הָיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it וּשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> where she was and her two כַלֹּתֶ֖יהָ <S%H3618><s%> daughters in law עִמָּ֑הּ <S%H5973><s%> her and they וַתֵּלַ֣כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> went בַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> on the way לָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> to return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said נָעֳמִי֙ <S%H5281><s%> And Naomi לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> unto her two כַלֹּתֶ֔יהָ <S%H3618><s%> daughters in law לֵ֣כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> Go שֹּׁ֔בְנָה <S%H7725><s%> return אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> each לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אִמָּ֑הּ <S%H517><s%> to her mother's [יַעֲשֶׂה כ] (יַ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> deal ק) יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עִמָּכֶם֙ <S%H5973><s%> with חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindly כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after עֲשִׂיתֶ֛ם <S%H6213><s%> deal עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמֵּתִ֖ים <S%H4191><s%> with the dead וְעִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> grant יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לָכֶ֔ם וּמְצֶ֣אןָ <S%H4672><s%> you that ye may find מְנוּחָ֔ה <S%H4496><s%> rest אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> each בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [of you] in the house אִישָׁ֑הּ <S%H376><s%> of her husband וַתִּשַּׁ֣ק <S%H5401><s%> Then she kissed לָהֶ֔ן וַתִּשֶּׂ֥אנָה <S%H5375><s%> them and they lifted up קוֹלָ֖ן <S%H6963><s%> their voice וַתִּבְכֶּֽינָה׃ <S%H1058><s%> and wept

וַתֹּאמַ֖רְנָה־ <S%H559><s%> And they said לָּ֑הּ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> will surely אִתָּ֥ךְ <S%H854><s%> for נָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> unto her Surely we will return לְעַמֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H5971><s%> with thee unto thy people

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said נָעֳמִי֙ <S%H5281><s%> And Naomi שֹׁ֣בְנָה <S%H7725><s%> Turn again בְנֹתַ֔י <S%H1323><s%> my daughters לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תֵלַ֖כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> go עִמִּ֑י <S%H5973><s%> have I הַֽעֽוֹד־ <S%H5750><s%> yet לִ֤י בָנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> with me? [are] there yet [any more] sons בְּֽמֵעַ֔י <S%H4578><s%> in my womb וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם לַאֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H376><s%> he

שֹׁ֤בְנָה <S%H7725><s%> Turn again בְנֹתַי֙ <S%H1323><s%> my daughters לֵ֔כְןָ <S%H1980><s%> Go כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> If זָקַ֖נְתִּי <S%H2204><s%> [your way] for I am too old מִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> to have לְאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to have an husband כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> If אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> If I should say יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> I have לִ֣י תִקְוָ֔ה <S%H8615><s%> hope גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> even הָיִ֤יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <S%H3915><s%> also to night לְאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [if] I should have an husband וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> and also יָלַ֥דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> and should also bear בָנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> sons

הֲלָהֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H3860><s%> for them תְּשַׂבֵּ֗רְנָה <S%H7663><s%> Would ye tarry עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after יִגְדָּ֔לוּ <S%H1431><s%> till they were grown הֲלָהֵן֙ <S%H3860><s%> for them תֵּֽעָגֵ֔נָה <S%H5702><s%> ? would ye stay לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> because הֱי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לְאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he אַ֣ל <S%H408><s%> nay בְּנֹתַ֗י <S%H1323><s%> my daughters כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַר־ <S%H4843><s%> for it grieveth לִ֤י מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> me much מִכֶּ֔ם <S%H4480><s%> than כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָצְאָ֥ה <S%H3318><s%> is gone out בִ֖י יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> for your sakes that the hand יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַתִּשֶּׂ֣נָה <S%H5375><s%> And they lifted up קוֹלָ֔ן <S%H6963><s%> their voice וַתִּבְכֶּ֖ינָה <S%H1058><s%> and wept again ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again וַתִּשַּׁ֤ק <S%H5401><s%> kissed עָרְפָּה֙ <S%H6204><s%> and Orpah לַחֲמוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H2545><s%> her mother in law וְר֖וּת <S%H7327><s%> but Ruth דָּ֥בְקָה <S%H1692><s%> clave בָּֽהּ׃

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold שָׁ֣בָה <S%H7725><s%> is gone back יְבִמְתֵּ֔ךְ <S%H2994><s%> Behold thy sister in law אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her עַמָּ֖הּ <S%H5971><s%> unto her people וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אֱלֹהֶ֑יהָ <S%H430><s%> and unto her gods שׁ֖וּבִי <S%H7725><s%> return אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> thou after יְבִמְתֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H2994><s%> thy sister in law

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said רוּת֙ <S%H7327><s%> And Ruth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּפְגְּעִי־ <S%H6293><s%> Intreat בִ֔י לְעָזְבֵ֖ךְ <S%H5800><s%> me not to leave לָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> thee [or] to return מֵאַחֲרָ֑יִךְ <S%H310><s%> from following after כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> where תֵּלְכִ֜י <S%H1980><s%> go אֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go וּבַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and where תָּלִ֙ינִי֙ <S%H3885><s%> and where thou lodgest אָלִ֔ין <S%H3885><s%> I will lodge עַמֵּ֣ךְ <S%H5971><s%> thy people עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> [shall be] my people וֵאלֹהַ֖יִךְ <S%H430><s%> and thy God אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

בַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Where תָּמ֙וּתִי֙ <S%H4191><s%> Where thou diest אָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> will I die וְשָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there אֶקָּבֵ֑ר <S%H6912><s%> and there will I be buried כֹּה֩ <S%H3541><s%> Thus יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> do יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לִי֙ וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus יֹסִ֔יף <S%H3254><s%> so to me and more כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> if הַמָּ֔וֶת <S%H4194><s%> also [if ought] but death יַפְרִ֖יד <S%H6504><s%> part בֵּינִ֥י <S%H996><s%> among וּבֵינֵֽךְ׃ <S%H996><s%> among

וַתֵּ֕רֶא <S%H7200><s%> When she saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִתְאַמֶּ֥צֶת <S%H553><s%> that she was stedfastly minded הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go אִתָּ֑הּ <S%H854><s%> for וַתֶּחְדַּ֖ל <S%H2308><s%> with her then she left לְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> speaking אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַתֵּלַ֣כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> went שְׁתֵּיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> So they two עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּאָ֖נָה <S%H935><s%> until they came בֵּ֣ית לָ֑חֶם <S%H1035><s%> to Bethlehem וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּבֹאָ֙נָה֙ <S%H935><s%> And it came to pass when they were come בֵּ֣ית לֶ֔חֶם <S%H1035><s%> to Bethlehem וַתֵּהֹ֤ם <S%H1949><s%> was moved כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> that all the city עֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H5921><s%> because וַתֹּאמַ֖רְנָה <S%H559><s%> about them and they said הֲזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נָעֳמִֽי׃ <S%H5281><s%> Naomi

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּקְרֶ֥אנָה <S%H7121><s%> unto them Call לִ֖י נָעֳמִ֑י <S%H5281><s%> me not Naomi קְרֶ֤אןָ <S%H7121><s%> call לִי֙ מָרָ֔א <S%H4755><s%> me Mara כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֵמַ֥ר <S%H4843><s%> bitterly שַׁדַּ֛י <S%H7706><s%> for the Almighty לִ֖י מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> hath dealt very

אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I מְלֵאָ֣ה <S%H4390><s%> accomplish הָלַ֔כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> I went out וְרֵיקָ֖ם <S%H7387><s%> empty הֱשִׁיבַ֣נִי <S%H7725><s%> hath brought me home again יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִקְרֶ֤אנָה <S%H7121><s%> why [then] call לִי֙ נָעֳמִ֔י <S%H5281><s%> ye me Naomi וַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> seeing the LORD עָ֣נָה <S%H6030><s%> hath testified בִ֔י וְשַׁדַּ֖י <S%H7706><s%> against me and the Almighty הֵ֥רַֽע <S%H7489><s%> hath afflicted לִֽי׃

וַתָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned נָעֳמִ֗י <S%H5281><s%> So Naomi וְר֨וּת <S%H7327><s%> and Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֤ה <S%H4125><s%> the Moabitess כַלָּתָהּ֙ <S%H3618><s%> her daughter in law עִמָּ֔הּ <S%H5973><s%> who הַשָּׁ֖בָה <S%H7725><s%> with her which returned מִשְּׂדֵ֣י <S%H7704><s%> out of the country מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְהֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and they בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came בֵּ֣ית לֶ֔חֶם <S%H1035><s%> to Bethlehem בִּתְחִלַּ֖ת <S%H8462><s%> in the beginning קְצִ֥יר <S%H7105><s%> harvest שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <S%H8184><s%> of barley
